mapper.select: SELECT p.patient_id as patientId, patient_name as patientName, patient_sex as patientSex, patient_age as patientAge, i_date as iDate, total_i_status as totalIstatus, d.d_id as dID FROM diagnosis d,reception r ,patient p WHERE d.r_id = r.r_id and r.patient_id = p.patient_id and d_status="완료" and i_date BETWEEN date_format(sysdate(),"%Y-%m-%d 09:00:00") and date_format(sysdate(),"%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59") ORDER BY i_date

select patient_id as patientId, bundle_code as bundleCode, i_id as iId, i_name as iName, i_unit as iUnit, i_status as iStatus, inspector,d_id as dId,upper_limit as upperLimit,lower_limit as lowerLimit from(select di.patient_id as patient_id, i.bundle_code as bundle_code, di.i_id as i_id, i.i_name as i_name, i.i_unit as i_unit, di.i_status as i_status, i.inspector as inspector, di.d_id as d_id, i.upper_limit as upper_limit, i.lower_limit as lower_limit from diagnosis_has_inspection di, inspection i where di.i_id = i.i_id and di.bundle_code = i.bundle_code) t where t.patient_id = #{pno} and t.d_id=#{did} ORDER BY bundleCode;
